text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: During this rite the Garou breathes deeply of Gaia
breath (air) 13 times. While so breathing, the Garou
clears her mind of all things save her love of Gaia.
-- System
The Garou must perform this rite at least once per
day for one full cycle of the moon. So doing enables
the Garou to lower by 2 the difficulty level of any
one healing or detection roll.

text.style: font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: This rite is performed in homage of the Garou's
totem spirit. Each spirit has a different rhythm
connected to it, and the Garou taps out this rhythm
with special drumsticks to honor her totem. Such
"sticks" are traditionally made of bone, but can be
fashioned from any material.
-- System
Any garou who performs this rite three times per
day for at least three consecutive days gains an
additional die to any roll while in the spirit Realms.
Once this die is used, the Garou must rebuild the
energies for additional three days before regaining
the extra die.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
